Posts.EditableText: Hi, I used to use Quest, a few months ago, and I remember there being a sort of map view in the gamebook editor. Where the pages would appear as blocks and you would drag and drop connections between them. Does anyone know if that is still there? Or if not, where I can download a build of Quest that does?
